alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Cumberland; Prince Edward (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cumberland, northeastern Prince Edward and west central Amelia Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Farmville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Farmville and Longwood University around 530 PM EDT. Rice and Guinea Mills around 550 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Raines Tavern, Tuggle, Reeds, Angola, Hawk and Stoddert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
